2810B8F0.Line7.7FA05: For all the good it did. After Scosglen, I hoped he could give me...I don’t know. Forgiveness. Guidance. Anything.

6F3E307B.Line11.7FA05: He spoke of the prophecy, his campaign against Lilith. I offered my help, but all he said was, “What use has a general for a broken soldier?”
